moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.effect: Has a small chance of making the target flinch.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Aggravation 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Foul Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up moves when the move’s target or targets are flinching, confused, or trapped.
